name.japanese: 突き上げる海流（ノックアップストリーム）

description: A massive vertical geyser that erupts from the ocean floor with incredible force, capable of launching ships thousands of meters into the sky. It occurs near Jaya and is the only known natural method of reaching Skypiea.

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Knock-Up Stream Location
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats reach the designated area where the Knock-Up Stream will erupt, guided by Masira and Shoujou's diving crew.
keyEvents.significance: Sets the stage for the dangerous journey to Skypiea.

keyEvents.title: The Knock-Up Stream Erupts
keyEvents.description: The massive geyser erupts with tremendous force, launching both the Going Merry and the Blackbeard Pirates' raft into the air.
keyEvents.significance: The pivotal moment that propels the Straw Hats to Skypiea and destroys the Blackbeard Pirates' vessel.

keyEvents.title: Riding the Knock-Up Stream
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry successfully catches and rides the vertical water column upward toward the sky.
keyEvents.significance: Beginning of the journey to Skypiea and one of the most visually spectacular moments in the series.

statusHistory.reason: Natural phenomenon that continues to occur periodically

description: A sea of clouds located 7,000 meters above the Blue Sea. The White Sea is formed from Island Clouds and serves as the lower layer of the sky, below the White-White Sea where Skypiea is located.

keyEvents.title: Approaching the Millennium Cumulonimbus
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry approaches the massive cloud formation where Skypiea is believed to exist.
keyEvents.significance: Transition point from the Blue Sea to the sky, marking the beginning of the Skypiea Arc.

keyEvents.title: Entry into the White Sea
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry passes through the clouds and enters the White Sea, leaving the Blue Sea behind.
keyEvents.significance: First time the Straw Hats experience a sky island environment.

statusHistory.reason: Natural sky region that exists permanently
